choose.otherwise: `user_id` AS `userId`, `avatar` AS `avatar`, `dept_id` AS `deptId`, `login_name` AS `loginName`, `user_name` AS `userName`, `user_type` AS `userType`, `email` AS `email`, `phonenumber` AS `phonenumber`, `sex` AS `sex`, `password` AS `password`, `salt` AS `salt`, `status` AS `status`, `del_flag` AS `delFlag`, `login_ip` AS `loginIp`, `login_date` AS `loginDate`, `create_by` AS `createBy`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_by` AS `updateBy`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `remark` AS `remark`
